4509.真・オノむそうの極意: Secret of Axes of True Evil

one enemy

21446.エリアに入ると\n動作不能になる\n魔法陣を描く:
A circle trap
that will
disable enemies.

21554.仲間ひとりの\n攻撃力を\nかなり上げる:
Significantly
raise attack
of an ally.

21580.周囲の仲間の\n守備力を\n少し上げる:
Slightly raises
defense of
all allies.

21604.周囲の仲間の\n行動間隔を\n少し短くする:
Shortens action
wait of
nearby allies.

21631.周囲の仲間の\nブレスダメージを\n少し軽減する:
Raises all allies
breath resistance
slightly.

21663.一定時間\n呪文をはねかえす\n魔法のバリア:
A barrier that
continually
reflects spells.

21692.周囲の仲間の\n攻撃呪文耐性を\n少しあげる:
Slightly raises
spell resistance
of all allies.

21721.範囲内にいる\n敵の守備力を\n少し下げる:
Lowers defense of
a nearby enemy
slightly.

21748.範囲内にいる\n敵の行動間隔を\n長くする:
Lengthens action
wait of nearby
enemies.

21775.範囲内の敵が\n攻撃呪文に\n弱くなる:
Lowers spell
resistance of
nearby enemies.

21799.範囲内の敵を\n深い眠りにさそう:
Attempts to put
nearby enemies
to sleep.

21839.行動せずに仲間の\nダメージを受ける:
Stand still and
take an ally's
damage.

21864.敵１体に\nダメージを与え\nテンションダウン:
Damage an enemy
and lower
their tension.

21916.敵を攻撃しつつ\n攻撃力も下げる:
Attack an enemy
and lower
their attack.

21938.大ダメージを与え\n敵をふっとばす:
Deals great
damage and knocks
back enemies.

21962.攻撃力を２段階と\nダメージを下げる:
Reduce damage
and attack by
2 stages.

21987.敵１体の激怒を\n解除する:
Disables the
rage of one
enemy.

22005.雑念をはらい\nブレスダメージに\n強くなる:
Become more
resistant to
breath damage.

22056.周囲の敵を\n大声でおどかし\n動けなくする:
Yell and attempt
to frighten
nearby enemies.

22167.テンションを\n一定時間維持する:
Maintain your
tension for a
duration.

22235.自分もキズつくが\nダメージもアップ:
Deals a strong
attack that also
damages you.

22294.なぐられると\nテンションアップ:
Gain tension
when you
are hit.

22316.攻撃時ＨＰ回復の\n効果をえる:
Restores HP based
on damage
dealt.

22337.チカラを一気に\n２回ためる攻撃:
An attack that
raises tension
by 2 levels.

22359.やいばに\n全身を包んで\n自分の身を守る:
Wrap yourself in
spikes to damage
attackers.

22386.ＨＰの３０％を\n仲間ひとりに\n分け与える:
Transfer 30% of
your HP to a
single ally.

22415.周りの仲間を\n身体をはって守る:
Take damage
in place of
nearby allies.

22473.光で周囲を滅する\n星雲のかがやき:
Destroys nearby
enemies with a
light nebula.

22497.１度だけダメージ\n無効にする:
Nullify one
source of damage
one time.

22518.自分を強化して\nふっとびに耐える:
Endure yourself
to any knockback
effects.

22542.優しい心で\n弱い敵を\n逃がしてあげる:
Let weak enemies
escape from
battle.

22584.逃げそうな敵を\nすかさず足止め:
Prevent enemies
from escaping
the battle.

22606.不思議なきりで\nブレスを1回回避:
A fog that can
nullify a breath
attack once.

22647.暗黒のきりで\n相手を弱らせる:
Dark fog that
weaken and
blinds enemies.

22668.白いオオカミが\n４回攻撃する:
A white wolf
attacks the enemy
4 times.

22689.黒い魔獣が攻撃し\nダメージも増加:
A black monster
attacks and
damage increases.

22713.魔法の結界で\n攻撃呪文から\n自分の身を守る:
Raise your spell
resistance with
a magic ward.

22764.動きを止めて\nＭＰを徐々に回復:
Focus yourself
and recover your
MP.

22808.攻撃呪文耐性を\n下げる３回攻撃:
Deals 3 attacks
and reduces
spell resist.

22867.ＨＰが半分以上時\n即死をまぬがれる:
Avoid fatal
damage if HP is
more than half.

22938.聖なる光で\nダメージを与える:
Damages an enemy
with holy light

22959.ＨＰが２以上で\n即死をまぬがれる:
Avoid fatal
damage if HP is
2 or more.

22983.仲間をいやす\nめぐみの雨が降る:
Allies will
restore HP when
taking damage.

23100.仲間のダメージを\n大きくいやす雨:
Rain that greatly
heals damage
allies take.

23124.周囲の仲間に\n炎のチカラを宿す:
Nearby allies
gain the power of
fire.

23146.周囲の仲間に\n氷のチカラを宿す:
Nearby allies
gain the power of
ice.

23168.周囲の仲間に風と\n雷のチカラを宿す:
Nearby allies
gain the power of
wind and thunder.

23193.周囲の仲間に土と\n闇のチカラを宿す:
Nearby allies
gain the power of
dark and earth.

23218.周囲の仲間に\n光のチカラを宿す:
Nearby allies
gain the power of
light.

23261.ＭＰをすべて使い\n敵を打ち滅ぼす\n最強の光の呪文:
Uses all MP in a
giant blast of
light.

23296.周囲にピオラと\nチャージ１０秒短:
Reduces party's
action wait and
CT skills 10s.

23320.仲間モンスターを\n一時的に強化する:
Temporarily power
up your fellow
monster.

23345.敵の魔法陣や\n爆弾を横取りする:
Steal enemy
magic circles
and bombs.

23367.消費アイテムの\n効果を２倍にする:
Doubles the
effect of
consumable items.

23391.ダメージ軽減する\n魔法陣を作る:
A magic circle
that reduces
damage taken.

23413.消費アイテムの\n効果範囲を広げる:
Expand the effect
range of
consumable items.

23437.ＨＰ回復する\n魔法陣を作る:
Magic circle
that slowly
restores HP.

23475.どうぐの効果が\n倍化と範囲化する:
Item effects and
their range are
doubled.

23499.きようさ次第で\nアイテムをぬすむ:
Steal an item
based on your
Deftness.

23523.敵１体の正体を\n討伐モンスター\nリストに書き込む:
Write an enemy's
secret details to
the Bestiary.

23558.近くの宝の場所を\n地図上でしらせる:
Reveal nearby
treasures on
your map.

23583.バナナをしかけて\n転ばせられるぞ:
Place a banana
that can be
tripped on.

23607.巨大なバクダンで\n敵をふっとばす:
Blow away foes
with a huge
bomb.

23631.死んだふりで\n敵をあざむき\nしっかりＨＰ回復:
Pretend to be
dead and recover
HP.

23663.威力がアップした\nバクダンをおく:
Place bombs that
are more
powerful.

23706.テンションを\n敵１体から奪う:
Attacks and
steals tension
from 1 enemy.

23727.周囲の味方に\n攻撃時猛毒の効果:
Grants allies an
envenom effect
on attacks.

23749.周囲の味方の会心\n暴走率アップ:
Boosts critical
and haywire rate
of allies.

23771.周囲の味方の呪文\n回復量をアップ:
Boosts spell
recovery of
nearby allies.

23795.周囲の味方の呪文\nダメージをアップ:
Boosts spell
damage of
nearby allies.

23820.周囲の味方を\n回復し生き返す:
Restore and
revive all
nearby allies.

23841.周囲の味方に\n攻撃時ＭＰ回復:
Grant allies MP
recovery on
attacks.

23862.周囲の味方に\n攻撃時ＨＰ回復:
Grant allies HP
recovery on
attacks.

23883.呪文特技の発動と\n行動間隔を短縮:
Quicken action
execution and
action wait time.

23907.周囲の敵の特技と\n呪文とブレス封印:
Seal nearby enemy
skills, spells,
breath attacks.

23963.周囲の敵の炎と\n光耐性ダウン:
Lowers fire and
light res. of
nearby enemies.

23984.周囲の敵の雷と\n風耐性ダウン:
Lowers thunder
and wind res. of
nearby enemies.

24005.周囲の敵の氷と\n闇と土耐性ダウン:
Lowers ice, dark,
and earth res. of
nearby enemies.

24042.周囲の味方の\n攻撃力を増加する:
Increase attack
power of
nearby allies.

24064.色紙代をはらって\n敵１体サイン攻撃:
Attack one enemy
with your
autograph!

24129.ボディーガードを\nゴールドでやとう:
Pay Gold to hire
a Bodyguard to
protect you.

24154.最高のほほえみで\n経験値とＧアップ:
Increases EXP and
Gold earned
after battle.

24179.ゴールドを使って\nセレブなダメージ:
Deals damage to
nearby enemies
using Gold.

24204.経験値とゴールド\n特訓スタンプ増加:
After battle EXP,
Gold, and stamps
are increased.

24229.敵周囲を攻撃し\n消費Ｇを０にする:
Attacks nearby
enemies. G costs
are now 0.

24253.ボケたおして\n周囲の敵を\nわらわせる:
If nearby enemies
laugh, raises
tension 1 level.

24279.ツッコんで\n仲間ひとりを\nわれに返す:
Cures paralysis,
charmed, sleep,
confused status.

24305.敵の攻撃を\nタップで身かわす:
Dance that
makes dodging
attacks easier.

24326.嵐のごとく\n玉をなげつける:
Hit an enemy
with a barrage
of balls.

24345.周囲の仲間の\nＨＰを７０～回復:
Restores at least
70 HP to all
nearby allies.

24367.周囲の仲間を\nわれに返す:
Return all
allies to
their senses.

24385.鬼神のごとく\n鉄球をなげつける:
Drop demonic iron
balls on an
enemy.

24428.周囲のＨＰを\n２００～回復する:
Restores at least
200 HP
around you.

24450.敵１体を攻撃し\nブレスを封じる:
Hit an enemy
and seal their
breath attacks.

24472.仲間ひとりと\nＨＰを分かち合う:
Share your HP
with one of your
companions.

24494.仲間ひとりと\nＭＰを分かち合う:
Share your MP
with one of your
companions.

24516.敵モンスターを\n１体呼び寄せる:
Calls another
enemy to join
the battle.

24538.敵１体を攻撃し\n特技を封じる:
Attacks 1 enemy
and seals their
skills.

24580.敵モンスターを\n２体呼び寄せる:
Calls 2 of the
targeted enemy
into battle.

25617.敵の攻撃を\nかわしやすくなる:
Increases the
chance to
dodge attacks.
